description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(122).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (22,1).
formula: a(n) = F(n, 22), the n-th Fibonacci polynomial evaluated at x=22. - _T. D. Noe_, Jan 19 2006a(n) = 22*a(n-1)+a(n-2) for n>1, a(0)=1, a(1)=22. G.f.: 1/(1-22*x-x^2). [_Philippe Del√©ham_, Nov 21 2008]
mathematica: a=0;lst={};s=0;Do[a=s-(a-1);AppendTo[lst,a];s+=a*22,{n,3*4!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Oct 27 2009 *)Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[122], 30]]  (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 13 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
